dcterms:creator: Jörgen Pind
Friðrik Magnússon
Stefán Briem
dcterms:description: The Icelandic Frequency Dictionary (IFD) corpus is a balanced corpus containing about 590 thousand tokens, collected in the early 1990s from published books, primarily fiction, biographies, and scholarly work.
dcterms:title: Icelandic Frequency Dictionary (IFD) Corpus

dcterms:creator: Hrafn Loftsson
Sigrún Helgadóttir
Ásta Svavarsdóttir
Eiríkur Rögnvaldsson
Kristín Bjarnadóttir
dcterms:description: MIM-GOLD is a subset of the MIM corpus, containing a greater diversity of texts than the IFD corpus, including texts from news media, blogs, and parliamentary speeches, with approximately 1 million running words.
dcterms:title: MIM-GOLD Corpus

dcterms:creator: Kristín Bjarnadóttir
dcterms:description: The Database of Modern Icelandic Inﬂections (DMII) is a lexicon containing about 280 thousand paradigms and close to six million inflectional forms, providing word forms and morphological features.
dcterms:title: Database of Modern Icelandic Inﬂections (DMII)

dcterms:creator: Steinþór Steingrímsson
Sigrún Helgadóttir
Eiríkur Rögnvaldsson
Starkaður Barkarson
Jón Guðnason
dcterms:description: The Icelandic GigaWord Corpus (IGC) is a very large Icelandic text corpus containing 1.2 billion words, aimed at providing extensive data for linguistic research.
dcterms:title: Icelandic GigaWord Corpus (IGC)
